description:
The Kitchen Measurement Converter will convert standard kitchen measurements and units for you. 1/8, 1/4, 1/2 teaspoons, tablespoons, cups, pints, quarts, gallons, ml and liters. 

Temperature conversions are now included (Fahrenheit & Celcius)

It also converts weights with pounds, ounces, grams and kilograms. 

When converting to ml or liters it gives full numbers, not fractions. 

Will convert from ml to unit of choice with rounding up to nearest fraction for the most easily readable results. 

This is the second version, get it now at $.99 and enjoy the features that will be coming, such as:

- Meat Cooking time/tempuratures

This is on its way to being a full featured kitchen calculator.

If you have any requests, please feel free to contact me!
